parameters: So you've come this far, boy!
Where are you even talking from?
It's my own way of talking!
But you heard me from who knows where!
Unless you're stopping us from going
I'd like to congratulate you for
making it down here so smoothly!
Though only a few paces left,
Did you hear about it from somewhere?

events.name: エネミーシンボル：ランダム
events.note: <PsensorF:3><HMすり抜け禁止><HM8方向移動禁止>
